  • - Perception testing of both how you see yourself and how you see your individual coworkers.
  • - Misalignment reports to show how your perception of someone is different than how they view themself.
  • - Consensus personality insights to alert you of when the majority of your coworkers agree on a factor of your personality that is different from how you see yourself.
  • - Relationship change tracker to reflect and visualize how your perception of your individual coworkers has changed over time.
